title: mni152reg
description: Registers the FreeSurfer subject to the FSL MNI 152 brain to create a tkregister-style registration matrix.

reg_matrix_2mm.title: Registration matrix 2mm
reg_matrix_2mm.description: Output registration matrix for standard 2mm target

reg_matrix_1mm.title: Registration matrix 1mm
reg_matrix_1mm.description: Output registration matrix for 1mm target when --1 flag is used
